response.original_title: A Writer in His Place: Earl Lovelace
response.overview: A Writer in His Place presents Trinidadian novelist Earl Lovelace as a writer rooted in his Caribbean space and inspired by the people and cultures of the region. In this “docu-commentary”, Lovelace emerges as a writer who is driven by a passion for life, and a love and respect for ordinary people.
response.title: A Writer in His Place: Earl Lovelace
